item.description:
Hello Everybody,

We have a permanent home at BROOKLINE LIBRARY.

We are meeting at HUNNEMAN HALL.

We have 5 tables and 5 chairs per table and kitchen use as well. Please note the library cafe is not open on sundays

The times also changed due to the hours of library. We will meet from 1:15 pm to 4:00 pm this Sunday

Please note there IS parking. PLEASE BE ON TIME.

Rules:

PLEASE SAY "YES" ONLY IF YOU ARE SURE
PLEASE ARRIVE 10 MINUTES EARLY. GAME STARTS ON TIME
GAME TIME IS 2 HOURS.
EACH TEAM IS ASSIGNED A COMMENTATOR.
AT THE END OF EACH GAME, WE HOLD A COMMENTATOR SESSION FOR 15 MINUTES FOR EACH TEAM.
COMMENTATORS DISCUSS THE RISKS AND REWARDS TAKEN BY EACH TEAM MEMBER

WE DO HAVE A WAITING LIST. THE GAME WILL END AT 4 PM. GAME FEE IS $5 PER PLAYER.
THANK YOU

EDAN BARSHAN
ORGANIZER
item.how_to_find_us: https://www.brooklinelibrary.com and click on MEETING ROOMS. We are meeting at HUNNEMAN HALL
item.name: The Metro Boston Cashflow February Meetup
